Posts.Content: Mar 5, 2009 09:48PM Kitt09 wrote: Man, sorry to hear you have to deal with cancer AND the inability of people to censor their mouths.   If it helps any, I've been trying to remind myself that people usually mean well, they just say really dumb things when they don't know what else to say.  I'm going to have to look around and see if there is a thread for it, but my husband still doesn't get why I'm upset about possibly getting a mastectomy (I have a 40%-60% chance of recurrance and haven't made a choice yet, I'm leaning toward the mastectomy).  He seems to think that getting implants somehow makes it all better.  It doesn't.
Posts.Title: Stupid Comments About Upcoming Mastectomy Shanagirl Kitt09
